video.title: Call it Christmas
video.Notes: Possibly my all time favourite Christmas song as it speaks to the fact that we all do something at this time of year. Even if it is not the same and we don't always call it Christmas.

video.title: JHe's a Pirate
video.Notes: Arranged for Garageband, Guitar and Clarinet. A fab tune which probably needs a better video effort.

video.title: Carrot
video.Notes: This was a music thing I borrowed from Linsey Pollak. Watch his TED talk on this it is fabulous. The tune is improvised and making carrot clarinets has been my STEM party piece for many years now. This particular carrot won me a 'talent' competition.
